mapper.insert: insert into pf_report(board_no, reporter_no, target_no, report_class_no) values(#{number}, #{reporterNumber}, #{targetNumber}, #{reportCategory.number})
mapper.select: select b.board_no, r.reporter_no, b.title, b.registered_date, b.view_count, c.report_class from pf_report r join pf_report_class c on r.report_class_no=c.report_class_no join pf_board b on r.board_no = b.board_no where r.reporter_no=#{userNumber} order by b.registered_date desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select r.reporter_no, r.target_no, m.id member_id, b.board_no, c.report_class, b.title, b.content, b.registered_date, b.view_count, f.file_name, f.file_path from pf_report r join pf_report_class c on r.report_class_no=c.report_class_no join pf_members m on r.target_no=m.member_no join pf_board b on r.board_no=b.board_no left outer join pf_board_attachment f on b.board_no=f.board_no where b.board_no=#{number}

select b.board_no, r.reporter_no, b.title, b.registered_date, b.view_count, c.report_class from pf_report r join pf_report_class c on r.report_class_no=c.report_class_no join pf_board b on r.board_no = b.board_no order by b.registered_date desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into pf_report(board_no, reporter_no, target_no, handle_class_no, handle_date, ref, re_step) values(#{number}, #{reporterNumber}, #{targetNumber}, #{handleCategory}, now(), #{ref}, #{reStep} + 1)
